Not much of a reviewer myself, but despite the game's flaws, it's a really fun experience when you really dedicate yourself to learning how to survive. Picking the perfect combo of perks, recognizing what killer you're going up against, and planning escape routes ahead of time, you can definitely learn to live more and die less! And of course on the killer side, learn what survivors you're fighting, and how to counter 'em and bam, it's a hookfest and a fun time.

Besides the game itself, the community behind it is pretty huge and bustling. I watch some streamers and YouTubers play the game a whole bunch. My top picks are Puppers, HybridPanda, and Monto. Good stuff!

mt bom

I don't have many hours in this game but I have been playing it nonstop. Before I bought this game I was worried because of youtube videos. Videos I watched showed many people leaving in the middle of matches very often. I bought this game on sale during the Steam Summer Sale 2019. It seems to have brought a wave of new players and I haven't had a problem at all. This game is worth every penny.

Overall its a good game, but there are several balancing issues.  In a 1v4 game, killer is not strong enough unless they get a good map, decent with the killer, and have "bad" survivors.  I play both sides, and killer is the most fun.  So long as you don't get toxic suvivors/killers, which there are way to many of, you will more than likely have a good time.

This game is clearly much more superior than Friday the 13th. I really wish they could take two concepts from that game though.  
Choosing the killer/survivors randomly as It takes way too long to find a game as a killer compared to a couple of seconds as a survivor. Also, I wish if there're more ways to survive other than generators.

Amazing game, one of the best asymmetric multiplayer experiences to date.  Leveling up is pretty grindy, and over half of the killers are locked as DLC. If you can get it on sale it's definitely worth a purchase.

Loved this game when it first came out, now sh** has hit the fan and I think they need to work on some things to make it more enjoyable... It's basically the same thing over and over, and the community is usually toxic af. Surprisingly. Maybe have a casual and a ranked choice instead because players don't understand how pips work :^)

Pretty fun game, I would definitely recommend you make sure you've got a few friends that have it and would be willing to play it with you before you consider purchasing. Also, be sure to approach the game with a "try to win, play for fun" attitude rather than a "play to win" attitude. You'll probably chew your own face off if you're the type who needs to be super competitive every match.

Jogo muito divertido para jogar sozinho ou com amigos.
Seja um sobrevivente batalhando para sair das perseguições dos mais terríveis ( e famosos ) monstros dos filmes! ( Como Leatherface, Freddy, Panico, Michael Myers) ! Reparando geradores, resgatando companheiros de Ganchos nefastos e mortíferos e "diblando" ( isso mesmo, "dibrê) os assasinos!

Pelo outro lado, caçe sobreviventes antes que eles consigam fugir de você e da famosa ( Entidade ), que por algum motivo reuniu esse grupo cruel de profissionais da matança! Impeça que os geradores sejam consertados e as portas de emergência não se abram, se esconda, saia correndo, pule janelas.. Faça o que for necessário para impedir que suas presas fujam e a Entidade fique descontente ( ou pior) com você !

Te vejo na "Neblina", seja reparando um gerador ou te salvando no gancho! 
Dead By Daylight !
